jobDescription: Startup company is seeking an Android/iOS mobile app developer/intern(UI/UX). A bachelors degree in computer science (or student) preferred. Have a published app or a prototype to show in resume. Familiarity with push notification, private user base communications, GPS, blockchain, crypto, private music streaming server and music/video players are all notable inclusions for consideration. Be a problem solver and team player as well and well treat you with the respect you deserve.
